medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent diarrhoea, anorexia, and weight loss.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in November 2010 and persisted with faecal volume exceeding 1 L per day despite fasting. No focal signs or symptoms preceded her loss of consciousness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension, autoimmune hypothyroidism treated with thyroxine, and widespread arthrosis.
